website_summaries.verdict: Brew a perfectly balanced cup of coffee every time with the Caribou Medium Blend.
pros: Caribou flavor is rich and bold, without any bitter or acidic taste
For a medium roast it gives a surprising jolt of energy in the morning
The K-Cups themselves are quality made and consistently brew a full cup
No issues with clogging, or leaving coffee grounds in your cup

customer_reviews.title: This last order tastes really bad. Lousy batch of coffee?
customer_reviews.text: Normally, I love this coffee. I have drank it for years. This last batch tasted muddy/moldy/green/cardboardy. It almost tastes like it wasn't roasted all the way. It leaves a bad oily taste in my mouth. All boxes so far taste this way. Amazon says the return window closed on the 31st. I'm not sure what to do next. Maybe this was a bad batch that got through Quality Control?
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Not The Same Caribou!
customer_reviews.text: I found these kcups to be very weak. I've been a caribou brand kcup drinker for about 9 years. I'm used to the rich bold flavor. These kcups did not taste like that at all. I checked the expiration date on the kcups and they were not expired. Why change what was so good? I'll be switching to something else. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: sammy

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these Caribou Medium Roast K cups for my morning coffee. The flavor is excellent--it is rich and inviting. These cups are strong enough to brew a large cup of coffee without it going weak. I love them and they are my new favorite. Plus, they are a great value, especially when compared to other major brands at the local grocery store. Buy these--you'll love them, too!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Q.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: Caribou is one of my favorite coffees. It has a good coffee taste and is very smooth. It is not light tasting nor very bold and best of all not acidic. The k cups work very well and never had any grounds in my coffee like many of the cheap brands
customer_reviews.author: John DTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: FAKE Caribou, NOT like before
customer_reviews.text: The coffee on the left is what I received and the coffee on the right is what I bought from kroger. After trying this amazon caribou coffee I felt like it tasted oddly bad, more bitter, and had a terrible after taste. Went and bought the real stuff and The taste is uncomparable. This may look like a good deal BUT ITS NOT CARIBOU! It’s definitely fake and even the little barcode is different. however, a couple months ago I do believe that were selling the real stuff bc I bought a batch in may/june and they tasted normal. That’s probably why there’s tons of OLD but good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Monaaa

customer_reviews.title: Caribou's Mahogany is the absolute best for the coffee snobs among us...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many, many coffee K-cups out there. Unfortunately, even the coffees that other people reviewed at 4.5 stars had that icky "dishwater" taste. This is the ONLY coffee for Keurigs I've found that tastes like you ordered it from an expensive coffee shop! Peet's brand- dark roast are are my second favorite, as they taste like the Seattle's Best coffee that I purchase in 2# bags at Sam's Club. I tried Gevalia's medium roast K-cups, and they didn't taste half as good as Caribou Mahogany! No comparison- these are the absolute BEST BEST ones you can buy. Now I saved you lots of wasted money on all the "dishwater" K-cups out there!
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The only coffee I drink nowadays
customer_reviews.text: As someone who drinks copious amounts of coffee a day, I like to be picky on which roasts I imbibe. I've been drinking coffee for 20 plus years, and would like to think I have a somewhat discriminating taste. So, it's with pleasure that I announce this to be by far and hands-down the best coffee; I prefer dark roasts, and it's earthy, dark and rich, but not at all bitter and without the acrid aftertaste some dark roasts have. It's warming and full-bodied, and is a pleasure to drink at any time of day. If you're also a picky coffee drinker, I recommend giving this one a taste.
customer_reviews.author: Megen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty close!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a daily Caribou coffee drinker for 10+ years, stopping daily between my parking garage & office. Last 5 months with the pandemic, that routine is gone. These K-cups are very close to what I remember from the coffee shop. To be totally honest the taste is exactly like Coffee brewed in one of their shops, then reheated in the microwave once it got cold a work. So not the same freshness, but close enough I'm happy. If you like Caribou get these, it's worth it. If you like Starbucks, Fu$& you.
customer_reviews.author: Not without my TJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good, slightly dark coffee that I'll order again
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this coffee. For those who are trying to find a new coffee to try, I put creamer in my coffee every morning--no sugar--, and if I order out, it's from Starbucks or a local coffee shop. Some other mass-produced coffee brands and types I enjoy (for comparison) include Sumatran, French Roast, and Starbucks Pike's Place. For taste, I think the Caribou Mahogany is a little darker/stronger than the Pike's but not as punchy as Sumatran beans from various brands. I really don't like Dunkin coffee and the Starbucks Blonde Roast because they're way too weak for me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Palica

customer_reviews.title: Wake up and smell the coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my morning coffee, and since I drink mine black, I tend to be super picky. Some brands taste good at the store but not with K-cups, but not the case with Caribu, each k-cup is packed with enough caffeine to give you the boost. This is smooth, rich, strong, tastes fresh and honestly, while it brews the aroma spreads in the house waking everyone up!! For the price and quality, Caribu aced it in comparison to its competitors. This is my 3rd box and never got disappointed in any order.
customer_reviews.author: Hala

customer_reviews.title: More than half of the kcups won't work in machine
customer_reviews.text: We've been getting it for several years and have had no problems until recently. The last two shipments have contained defective k cups. Our keurig gives an error message that it's not the right kcup and won't accept it. More than half of the k cups have had problems. The other day I had to go through 4 just to get one that would work. We get several different brands of coffee and this is the only one that has caused us any trouble, so it's not the machine.
customer_reviews.author: SMF

customer_reviews.title: Needs quality control
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the variety pack to determine which to order, we liked all but Obsidian was our favorite. So we ordered a supply..only it tastes nothing like the first batch. To be sure we weren't wrong, we did a blind taste test with the one from the original variety pack...totally different. Same thing with the blend...I am beginning to think they just swept it off the floor and called it 'blend'
customer_reviews.author: cunctator

customer_reviews.title: Read, Buy it, Move on seamlessly with the technology
customer_reviews.text: Whoever invented the K-Kup, what took so long to take most of the hassle aspects of a daily routine while producing tons of waste starting at about 12 years old. I hope the inventor didn’t wait too long to enjoy the unimaginable riches accumulating as I type. Lots of stale cold wasting perhaps the highest cost to produce non-alcoholic drink world wide next to only tea that I’m sure comes in an extremely respectable 2nd. Purchase enjoy and think only ONCE AND BRIEFLY “What took ME so damn long?????
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: The coffee is awesome, when the pods don't explode!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are not the same as the ones we get from retail stores! Approximately one out of two burst from the foil seal, making a big mess in my Keurig each time. I had to disassemble each time before we could use the coffee maker again. I noticed when I received the order that the foil tops were bulging a bit. I assumed they were okay. These are too expensive to have to throw that many away. The coffee is awesome, when the pods don't explode!!!
customer_reviews.author: rma1998

customer_reviews.title: Great taste at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried more coffee than I can count. Some tasted great, but I couldn't justified the price. Others had a great price, but tasted horrible. Then I found these. Smooth tasting and not to strong. I have a friend that hated coffee until I made her a cup of Caribou...Next day she bought her own Keurig and Caribou pods. At around $.42 per pod that cheaper than any cup of coffee you could buy from some fast food place and it's a lot faster to make it at home. If your looking for a great taste at a great price this is the coffee for you!
customer_reviews.author: Merk_man

customer_reviews.title: Not what I remember
customer_reviews.text: Tried this in variety pack and distinctly remember being impressed with the taste. Bought a bunch that day thinking these would be my new daily driver. The batch that came tastes nothing like how I remember the sample. Maybe my memory is off, but I don't think it could have been so far off that I confused a nice cup of coffee with something so burnt and bitter. I'm disappointed. As far as I've experienced, Death Wish makes the best tasting K cup I've used. More expensive, but pretty dang good.
customer_reviews.author: rwt

customer_reviews.title: Great full body taste UPDATE PROBLEM added
customer_reviews.text: Obviously everyone has different tastes. We have a variety of K cups, plus we have our own coffee maker. We don’t drink these all the time, but when we do they are our favorite!/ NEW The last 6 box pack we purchased was bitter - not at all like the first batch we purchased that was perfect. We sent it back. We then ordered a variety pack from this company to try some of their others. The caribou blend was included. We tried it and it was as good as the original batch we had purchased. Maybe the “bad” batch we had was accidentally burnt.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Petra

customer_reviews.title: Used to love then they changed it
customer_reviews.text: It's changed. I have had this on auto ship for YEARS and have always loved its bold smooth flavor. The last 2 I have received have been awful! Not sure what has happened but it now tastes like water. At first thought it was my keurig so cleaned it, but they still tasted bad after that. It tastes as if there are no coffee beans in them. I ended up throwing them away. Figured maybe I just got a bad batch but when the next shipment was just as bad knew it wasn't just me. I have switched to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Beth I

customer_reviews.title: For me this is hands down the best k-cup coffee I have found.
customer_reviews.text: Coffee is generally a matter of taste so while I can't lend you my taste buds. I can tell you is that this is hands down the best k-cup coffee I have ever had. My wife loves it and have had a few people over that commented on it. I don't mean to leave the impression that this coffee will change your life or anything, but only that this seems to make a solid cup of coffee that most people will really enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Freakin Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I could spend hours regaling how freakin delicious this coffee is compared to others, but I'll give you the short version: 1. Freakin 2. Delicious But seriously though, the coffee is delicious and although it is a medium roast it is smooth and tastes like a light roast coffee. No char flavor & a rather appetizing aroma. I strongly encourage anyone who drinks coffee (either black or with cream/sugar) to try this coffee. It is my favorite coffee.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: At times I get a better price elsewhere in spite of the subscription status
customer_reviews.text: I continue to use this coffee and that should suffice as a review. The lighter roasts seem to have a purer flavor of coffee. Darker roasts are bitter, thus I now prefer this Daybreak morning blend. At times I get a better price elsewhere in spite of the subscription status.
customer_reviews.author: Safety Czar

customer_reviews.title: Great way to start your day!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried Caribou one day... after not being totally happy with a previous coffee. Found Caribou to be clean, no biter notes, and a generally great regular coffee. It has evolved to become my 'go to' coffee every morning. So far, everything is working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Normally a Great Coffee......now not so much in flavor or cost....
customer_reviews.text: We have these on subscribe and save for my husband and normally there is no problem, however, what they sent us, at an exorbitantly increased price the last time, has been bitter and burnt tasting, undrinkable. We tried buying it at other brick and mortar stores but they have been out of it, thus the increased prices on Amazon. What they are sending us must be super old or something, but it's nasty. We will wait until things normalize before trying this again. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee - Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this coffee for 2 years almost by monthly. In the 20+ orders of 96 K-cups (1920 K-cups) I have had 4 individual cups that were defective. When I had 2 bad cups in a row I notified Caribou and they immediately sent me several replacements. I write both positive and negative reviews. Good reviews are just as important as negative ones. Give credit where credit is deserved. Love the coffee, love the service.
customer_reviews.author: B Holly

customer_reviews.title: Delish and fast
customer_reviews.text: My favorite roast of coffee. I just love it. It was delivered very fast, the day after I purchased it, and it is still the same coffee I love. It's a fantastic dark roast. I love coffee, and it takes a good cup of java to make me happy (well happier) in the morning before I go to work. Fast delivery, great coffee. It you're a dark roast person like me, you'll really like it. Makes my morning.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: Not the real coffee - obvious the pods have been tampered with
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this coffee many time before. The shipment I received just days ago seems off. The coffee pods look like they could have been open and resealed. The coffee taste way different, like Folgers????
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste of this coffee. I buy it all the time. Will buy again. Oh one more thing, I really am not a coffee drinker. So when my husband wanted me to try it I thought I would not like it. Surprise!! I LOVED IT.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Coffee is not fresh - out of date
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee. And the Vikings. Buy it when I’m in Minnesota. 60 count arrived today 7/1/20. “Best Buy” date is 7/8/20. That’s next week. Not acceptable. And can’t be returned. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Tastes stale - probably old product. Love Caribou.
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews, the Caribou coffee on this order just tasted bad - like it was old and stale. I love Caribou and have drunk it for years. If you look at the K-cups carefully, the tops of the ones on this order were not puffed out as they should be. The K-cups are filled with nitrogen when made to preserve the coffee flavor. Once the nitrogen is gone the coffee becomes stale. Could be because of age (although the good-until date was OK on my order), or (more likely IMO) this order was stored improperly (hot, humid, ... place). Love Caribou but have not had good luck ordering it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: esym

customer_reviews.title: Coffee or laundry?
customer_reviews.text: Before I even opened my Amazon box I could smell a dryer sheet scent filling the air. Surety opening the box & finding the coffee to be the culprit of the smell, I immediately took the KCups out of the box and sat them outside to air out. 12 hours later, my house still reeks of dryer sheet as do the the KCups, that are still outside. I don't understand what the deal is, so bizarre!
customer_reviews.author: helen_02

customer_reviews.title: makes a good brew
customer_reviews.text: coffee taste is in the taste bud of the beholder. I think the medium roast label is accurate for this coffee. Brisk enough to get one's attention with a good aroma. Not so special that I'm motivated to drink it every morning, but I'll be very happy to have it in my rotation. That also means it's a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J

customer_reviews.title: something changed..
customer_reviews.text: I used to really like this brand/flavor, however this last batch tasted different. It was much weaker and had less tang to it. They even have different labels on them than what is shown. Not sure if they've changed something such as the amount of coffee in each cup, or their coffee itself changed, but I'm not too pleased with this box...
customer_reviews.author: C. Bird

customer_reviews.title: Change in quality
customer_reviews.text: My last order showed a slightly different label and when I tried to use the pods they would not puncture in the machine. The sides of the pods are thinner and they just wrinkle instead of being stiff. I received a replacement order but that box is the same. I will not order these again. I am surprised they carry the Keurig brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great “K-Cup” Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Good coffee for what it is—let’s be honest k-cup coffee isn’t the highest quality—though this Caribou blend is MUCH better than other, similar light roast blends I’ve purchased in k-cups. Again, this coffee won’t beat out a good pour over, much like a frozen pizza won’t beat out a good, home-cooked meal; however, someone looking for a good cup of coffee quickly won’t go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: A. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite coffee ever since I got my first Keurig several years ago. I used to be able to find this locally, but haven’t been able to in awhile, so I was glad to be able to get it through Amazon. It’s a light, bright coffee with no aftertaste. I enjoy this coffee very much and feel that Amazon has a good price for it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie L.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty, deflated k-cups
customer_reviews.text: I've had great experience purchasing in the past but the last delivery I received, many of the coffee cups were deflated which apparently is a big deal. I initially thought my keurig needed to be replaced so I even bought a new one and was still experiencing the same problem. Morning after morning I would put the k-cup in and i'd get a cup full of coffee grinds until one day I realized that the cups causing this were the deflated ones!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Puzzled
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my favorite coffee’s and I’m just puzzled at the price increase on this product. I bought this last month for $ 32.71 for six boxes and now it’s $39.71 for six boxes!! I can see things going up but by $7.00 dollars that’s a joke!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite coffee to order for the office. Not as strong as the starbucks one, but a lot smoother. My coworkers laugh at me because they can't tell the difference in taste, but I'd say it's pretty noticeable. Also, not sure if this really has to do with much of anything, but the pressure in each cup is much higher than the starbucks cups which can be a bit flat. Maybe it keeps it fresher? I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: AZH

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee - needs to be subscribe and save!
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee! My favorite! I’m not even a Vikings fan. I wish I could subscribe and save on this coffee. If so, I’d order it every month. Because of that I gave it 3 stars for value. 5 stars for everything else. Good stuff! Lots of flavor - no burnt flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Ames47

customer_reviews.title: Stop shopping, you found the best!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best k cups you can buy for an affordable price. Yes you can find cheaper k cups, but you wont beat the flavor of Caribou! Well worth the few cents extra per cup
customer_reviews.author: Rick Taylor

customer_reviews.title: SKOL COFFEE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Vikings and I love this coffee! I love how it comes in individual boxes of 10! Total of 60 ( 6 small boxes) Great to give individual boxes for gifts! Love!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Flavor!!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in California but when I used to live in Minnesota, Caribou Coffee was the place too go. The taste is great I also like the Hazelnut flavor coffee as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pagano

customer_reviews.title: For my mother in law
customer_reviews.text: My mother in law has a coffee machine but refuses to buy coffee because it’s too expensive. Hahaha so we buy her a box of these every month and have it delivered to her house. In the beginning, we went around trying different ones but this is the one she said that tasted the best. I didn’t give it a five star because I personally think it tastes horrible. But to each their own. She loves it. She’s happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sallyb00

customer_reviews.title: Super good
customer_reviews.text: My favorite!! Great simple yummy flavor. It’s not super strong which I like so I can have a few cups of this a day. Because I love drinking coffee all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coffee for my mouth
customer_reviews.text: Yes!!!!! All of the coffee!!!! I love caribou and was thrilled when I found I could get the decaf kcups. This is such a great price too! What an awesome find <3
customer_reviews.author: KattyPants

customer_reviews.title: Beware.  Returns not accepted.
customer_reviews.text: Beware that returns are not accepted by the seller and they do not appear to follow Amazon's return policy. Not sure this product is genuine. Appears different from the usual Caribou Coffee. ****UPDATE: The seller agreed to a refund after I contacted them after this review.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Too weak
customer_reviews.text: I usually get Donut Shop Regular which is also a medium roast, but this Caribou stuff is too weak for my taste. It tastes like restaurant coffee to me, which I always find to have a watery taste.
customer_reviews.author: Marou

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I was spoiled growing in Germany, I got to drink the best tasting coffee. So it was hard to find similar coffee here in the U.S. and I always longed to drink a delicious cup of coffee that compared to the coffee you could find in Germany. I used to rely on McDonalds coffee for a while until I discovered this brand and I'm glad I did. Even the coworkers around me are telling me how good the coffee smells! Get it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Van Havermaet

customer_reviews.title: The best bold roast you'll ever taste
customer_reviews.text: I have now re-ordered this exact coffee five or six times--and plan on reordering it for a long time. This is by far one of the BEST coffee blends I have ever tasted--smokey, dark, and rich without that gross metallic taste that can sometimes accompany bolder blends. The taste is warm and earthy with the delicious sort of aftertaste that makes you want yet another cup... and this is coming from someone who is intensely picky. I only drink coffee that's so bold I could float on it ;). Seriously, give this blend a try--you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Megen

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee...very poor cup design!
customer_reviews.text: Caribou Blend k-cups are by far my favorite cups to use in my Keurig. However, the quality of the k-cups themselves is phenomenally POOR. About 1 in 10 experiences what I have a dubbed “a blowout”...the grounds begin to come out of the bottom and the top of the k-cup during the brewing cycle. This forces me to have to take the Keurig parts out and thoroughly clean the machine. What a mess!
customer_reviews.author: B. Brininstool

customer_reviews.title: Only 50, not 60...and expired
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the SKOL 60ct. I received 5 boxes of 10. so a totally of 50 & on top of that every single box was expired.... cool... came from a 3rd party seller apparently but amazon did give me a full refund which I was very grateful for. Thank you amazon for Making it right on behalf of someone else’s screw up.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Sticker says Caribou Daybreak Morning Blend which I did order but inside box is Swiss Miss hot cocoa mix. 34 pods in box.
customer_reviews.author: Deb SC

customer_reviews.title: No bitter after taste
customer_reviews.text: When I received my single serve coffee maker for Christmas, I received a variety pack. After much searching, I found the Caribou Coffee Blend, in a quantity that would last a month so I could get a subscription for it. I really like the flavor and the fact that it has no bitter after taste. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi K. Lowrimore

customer_reviews.title: We love this coffee!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only kind of coffee we have in our home. It has a smooth flavor and rich aroma. It is so convenient to purchase through Amazon on the Subscribe and Save program and you do save a lot compared to purchasing in any store! This is one thing I will keep on the program for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: great coffee from well known brand
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our favorite coffee brands. Great rich taste and more dark flavor than most medium roasts. These were shipped and arrived as expected and in good condition. Have on subscribe and usually one or two pods are dented.
customer_reviews.author: Ljgodfrey

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great. Good replacement for discontinued "Krispy Kreme Smooth" pods
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the search for a replacement for Krispy Kreme's "smooth" coffee. Don't listen to KK, their new "classic" is NOT "smooth" with a new name. This "Daybreak Morning Blend" is the closest I have found. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: musicfan

customer_reviews.title: Good price ------ BUT
customer_reviews.text: First let me say that I am a light roast coffee drinker and this coffee does NOT qualify. It has a harsh bitterness and and an aftertaste that is NOT at all pleasant. It is NOT my go to blend. If you have the same taste as I do, try Caza Trail Coastal Blend. I bought a 32 cup box and am not sure if I will use all of them before the expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST COFFEE KNOWN TO MANKIND
customer_reviews.text: It took me a long time to like coffee. I finally started to and started traveling for work and found a caribou stand in the Denver airport. Now every time I fly through there I make a point (even if I’m running late) to get to that stand!!! I’m addicted. So excited to see they started making Keurig pods. And yes, they taste just as good (not like typical watered down bitter pods)!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Pope

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Caribou coffee is generally not dark/bold enough for me but Mahogany is great! It is both bold and smooth...no flowery aftertaste for me like Jet fuel has. I have found that I really don't enjoy coffee without a kick...Donut shop coffee is not for me. Here is what I have found to be my bold favorites: Double Black Diamond (Green Mountain) Mahogany (Caribou) Midnight Magic (Timothy's) Black Tiger (Coffee People) I like variety (so it doesn't just all start to taste the same) and so I throw in Sumatra, Newman's own, French Roast, Italian Roast etc from time to time. Hope this is helpful to other bold coffee lovers! (I appreciate finding the above through reading other's reviews!)
customer_reviews.author: ghchik

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed to report that I was disappointed by this product. Historically I have loved all Caribou coffee (which is hard to find in TX, so Amazon is the way to go). I usually love the flavor and find it to be very smooth. But, I've only used bagged coffee before trying these K-cups. I feel like these cups do not make smooth coffee - I would describe the flavor as somewhat soapy. I even washed out and wiped out multiple mugs and cups to make sure it was the coffee taste. This would likely be remedied by cream/sugar, but I drink my coffee black. Probably won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee... bad pricing
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee and this was a good deal when it was $13 but the price seems to be constantly changing making me stressed out about whether it will continue to exist. Therefore, I switched to a french press.... way better quality and WAY cheaper at like $0.15 per cup. Do yourself a favor... buy a french press and learn how to make better tasting coffee that is a quarter of the price and better for the environment.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Pods leak grounds from around the lid
customer_reviews.text: I was in the Marines for 11 years and had my fill of chewy field/deployment coffee. Now that I'm out, I'd really like to enjoy a cup without having to pick coffee grounds out of my teeth. Y'all are about to give me flashbacks of Iraq FOB coffee over here... The lid on every other pod comes loose, and during the pneumatic cycle, pushes coffee grounds out of the pod from the separated part of the lid and suddenly my Keurig is covered in coffee grounds, and towards the bottom of my cup the coffee gets chewy. Chewy flashback coffee is no bueno. 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Wendall

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with all Keurig brewers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these K-cup coffee pods because in the description it says it works with all Keurig brewers. Unfortunately my Keurig 2.0 brewer won’t recognize the pod. Now I’m stuck with 69 pods of coffee I can’t drink. I don’t understand why since I’ve bought identical caribou coffee pods before and they worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: smadap

customer_reviews.title: I like the flavor of Caribou because it is rich without ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor of Caribou because it is rich without being bitter or overly strong. It's great in the morning for that first cup when I need it most. I'm loving it on my second or third order... Coffee is so much a part of my life that I include coffee in my art.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Z.

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee, my local store stopped carrying it, I’m glad I found it here and can get an authentic shipment every six weeks for a lower price. Thank you so much It comes in a box with smaller individual boxes, perfect
customer_reviews.author: Liz Jones

customer_reviews.title: I've bought this coffee several times. This time, the product was NOT good.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this coffee several times on re-order. This time, the product was different and not in a good way. At first I thought it might be me. It wasn't. I had a few people over that I've served this product to in the past and they ALL agreed it was not the same. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina S.

customer_reviews.title: Weak coffee, why?
customer_reviews.text: For some unknown reason this coffee didnt taste right. It seemed very weak. Ive ordered it twice before and it was great. I dont get it. Had to use it though on fixed income. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Nighthawk

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: I should've paid attention to the reviews, but I figured it had been months so whatever was wrong with the shipment they got had right itself. Wrong. The coffee tastes old or stale. I even cleaned my Kuerig thinking that might be it. Pay attention to the reviews and if you want Caribou, go get it at Caribou or the grocery store. The Amazon shipment is really, really bad. Also, anyone want to buy 5 boxes off of me?!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Blaney

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I'm from Seattle and have tried many a small local coffee place and all their offerings... this is still the first cup of coffee I genuinely enjoy drinking. I would still drink this even if it was 100% caffeine free. I generally despise bitter flavors and often drown my coffee in sugars, syrups, and milks to mask the flavor. I drink this black! It's so smooth and where there is usually bitter, biting notes, this coffee leaves you with warm, smooth, woodsy notes.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: "Woodsy" Mahogany - Dark Roast
customer_reviews.text: We have bought this coffee several times before and enjoy it immensely! We will purchase more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Now the taste of this coffee at home!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite type of coffee. I travel the country looking for it. Now I can drink it at home.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC coffee
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely picky about my coffee. There are only 3 that I will drink, this is one of them. Starbucks Christmas blend and also Folgers Columbian. Caribou coffee medium roast is has great flavor. You will not be disappointed in this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Goto Pod Flavor for using Kahlúa and other Liquor Add-ins
customer_reviews.text: This coffee has a nice flavor, aroma, and is strong enough to stand up to add-ins like Kahlúa and other liquors. A main stay in our countertop coffee offerings, but not my initial morning cup of Joe, unless I am really dragging, and willing to have that coffee flavor hang around in my mouth for hours. It makes my top 5 gotta-haves list of coffee pods.
customer_reviews.author: Dal

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this coffee alongside the Green Mountain medium roast Nantucket coffee. This coffee is strong enough while still being a medium roast. Great flavor, slightly "nutty" and definitely smooth, not bitter. This is my early morning need to wake up coffee! Compared to the Green Mountain med roast, this one is stronger and a bit more flavorful. I would also say it is stronger than the Gevalia mild roast but would say they are similar in flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: K kup  grounds everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered several k cups this is the first time they started leaking ground all over. I even have a brand new kuerig. Pictures show three different k cups from same box they are exploding with grounds all over my brand new Keurig and in coffee cup
customer_reviews.author: crystal garhammer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, medium nonbitter coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Love this medium blend coffee! The “black” coffee drinker in the house loves it, as well as the heavy cream coffee drinkers! We used to buy Trader Joe’s coffee pods but the convenience of delivery is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: xx7862n37x

customer_reviews.title: Very robust and smooth.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this blend. I encountered it at a Caribou Coffee stand in the Minneapolis airport and started looking for it once I got my Keurig coffee brewer and could have different brands of coffee one cup at a time. It’s a robust brew but very smooth, stands up to the creamer well.
customer_reviews.author: nobody_special

customer_reviews.title: Great! A little extra caffeine first thing!
customer_reviews.text: Light and a bit nutty, Caribou Coffee Daybreak K-Cups is my go-to java first thing in the a.m. It is lightly roasted, so it has a little extra jolt of caffeine. By the time I'm ready for breakfast, I move to dark roast, Peet's Major Dickinson or Starbucks French Roast, both of which are a hardy drink but lighter on caffeine.
customer_reviews.author: SharonDiane

customer_reviews.title: Fresh
customer_reviews.text: Loved it... actually I didn’t want to order ot as I ordered it by mistake, I wanted the hazelnut. Yet this one is light roast, very good taste. I will be back for the hazelnut flavor!! And yes, I don’t like very strong coffee in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Noor R

customer_reviews.title: great coffee
customer_reviews.text: this coffee is great and I love to drink it every morning. If I am not at Starbucks
customer_reviews.author: Corpsman

customer_reviews.title: Caribou Caribou Blend
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee, rich taste with no bitterness. If you like medium roast this is a must try. If you are a Gevalia coffee drinker recommend you try this. It has a very subtle hint of sweetness to flavor but not as much as a Costa Rica blend. Great cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Great great great tasting coffee. I use them with my Mixpresso and they fit perfectly. Simply delicious coffee. I buy a lot of different blends of organic coffee from all over the world and use it with a pod I can refill, and these pods really do taste great all the way around for a well balanced cup of coffee. Enjoy! ~ DM
customer_reviews.author: D. Meola

customer_reviews.title: Best Caribou K Cup in Medium with Cocoa Essences and Amazing Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Best K Cup coffee brand that I have had so far. Caribou Medium and is flavored with essence of cocoa and gives you that caffeine kick. It is not bitter at all and the coffee flavors are so smooth. It is my go to brand every time. They do have other flavors so make sure you note which one you end up liking.
customer_reviews.author: TatianaRose

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product, horrible quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible experience. Do NOT buy this product. About a third of the k-cups when used will spill the coffee grounds in your coffee mug. I contacted Caribou Coffee Company and after transferring my complaint to a couple of different departments they told me to contact Keurig because they roast and packaged the k-cups and sent me a nice “case closed” email. I emailed Keurig and received an automated email that someone will look at my complaint and will get with me as soon as possible; however no answer. Horrible customer service from both companies.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: delicious
customer_reviews.text: Close to making it to 5 stars. I 'd give it 5 if it were just a little bit bolder in flavor. It's smppth and mellow and not acid (good things) but just a tiny bit more timid that I like, though I used all of the pods and would be happy to have more. I also like Tully's Hawaiian Blend and Peet's Domingo.
customer_reviews.author: Carol from Santa Rosa

customer_reviews.title: caribou/caribou blend k-cups crappy taste
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering caribou blend k-cups for quite some time because my wife and I like the flavor of this coffee more than most. the last batch I purchased was quite bad tasting. It had an old flat taste. We used about half a box of 72 and threw the rest in the trash. I'm afraid to order more. Would not recommend it again.
customer_reviews.author: James Newell

customer_reviews.title: I like my coffee black, the way it is supposed to be drunk.
customer_reviews.text: I know the Keurig is not the ideal way to brew coffee, but since my wife must drink decaf and I prefer extra-caf the Keurig is a good compromise for us. Since purchasing a Keurig machine, I have settled on Caribou's Mahogany as my coffee staple. Drinking coffee black makes the flavor and body of the coffee extremely important. Mahogany works. Once in a while I also make a cup of La Colombe's Corsica coffee using a k-cup adaptor. The boys at La Colombe would probably consider this brewing method sacrilegious but it still produces a damned fine cup of strong coffee.
customer_reviews.author: BogKid

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee, horrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee. It is fresh and flavorful. The packaging needs work. two in opening on top and bottom of box covered with a wide strip of tape. To get it out the box you have to rip open all four individual boxes of coffee. Also the box is very difficult to open in my opinion. Took a lot of effort.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: A Very Satisfying Light Roast
customer_reviews.text: Caribou Daybreak Morning Blend is a very, very good Light Roast coffee with a smooth texture and a lingering aftertaste that is nicely balanced. This coffee is delicate in its taste and aroma, but very satisfying anytime you might want a lighter brew. I’m primarily a medium roast drinker, but at times I want something more robust, and at other times, something more light and mellow. This coffee serves nicely for the later. Caribou Daybreak Morning Blend gets the “John’s Cup” light roast seal of approval!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Out of the Midwest
customer_reviews.text: This company has a drive-thru at the Minneapolis airport, so took a chance on something other than Starbucks. Now a regular choice when in the area. Recently, found a drive-thru in ND, and enjoyed a cup with an elderly parent. It was a hit, so now sending it by Amazon directly to the door. Great roast variety, but this is a nice medium blend.
customer_reviews.author: MHV

customer_reviews.title: Faulty seals are causing messy leaks. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Caribou used to be my favorite coffee. I don't know what's happened, but the quality control has dropped significantly. Almost every k-cup that I received has a faulty seal which leads to it leaking terribly. This causes water, coffee, and ground to get everywhere as it seeps from the machine. Now every cup I drink has coffee grounds in it and I have a mess to clean up. Needless to say I will not be buying Caribou coffee anymore. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Echa

customer_reviews.title: Caribou Mahogany is the bomb....
customer_reviews.text: Ok so it took a few years for me to convert to a Kurig but, after spending a week in Florida with family and seeing how easy it is to simply have 1 cup of coffee and not make a whole pot, I was sold.....thank goodness the Caribou Mahogany K-cups taste delicious because I am a bit of a coffee snob!!! I mean, if i'm going to drink coffee, it has to be good right?
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Bitter case of coffee
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to state that this last order of Caribou is very bitter. I been using this coffee for more than a few years and it has never had such bitterness. Too bad I already opened the box or I’d return it. I’ll try again.
customer_reviews.author: Angiec

customer_reviews.title: Perfect morning cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Caribou coffee tastes the best and purchasing in bulk has been great!
customer_reviews.author: swillis

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong brand and flavor of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Love Caribou Coffee and have had this on auto-ship for months. My hubby opened last shipment when I wasn’t around and he thought I intentionally switched to Donut Shop brand coconut mocha flavor....I did not. Received full case of incorrect coffee, but imagine it can’t be returned now since my hubby opened one of the boxes. Not happy with such a major error.
customer_reviews.author: tjb0910

customer_reviews.title: Re-DONE ONE of my boxes were bad, but another I opened tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's a hit or miss with expired stuff. But still my favorite blend, 2 k cups tasted nasty in one box but opened another and it's great! Maybe I just had an expired one or something. But the last order I had was perfectly fine too, so idk!
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with this coffee. It has weird taste to it. I think it might not be fresh, that is why. And there are so many of them, I am not sure if i will even finish it.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina Piksaeva

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a fairly good coffee for the price. It has a smooth mellow taste, not the most robust coffee you can find but an acceptable level of flavor. I prefer this coffee to McCafee; Newman's Organic Blend and other bargain brands I have tried. Will probably buy this one again when I need some more.
customer_reviews.author: BenSanzTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: It is consistently good tasting.
customer_reviews.text: We found this one year traveling in the Denver Airport; but couldn't find it anywhere. When we found it online in K-pods we were very happy with our discovery. We have reordered several times and have not found another coffee we enjoy as much. We would highly recommend to anyone looking for full body, yet not bitter coffee. They do have a dark roast as well for those that like a richer taste and a decaf too.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: A balanced and flavorful cup.
customer_reviews.text: I drink my coffee black and enjoy different roasts, with some tendency to reach for dark roasts. I can be a bit of a coffee snob - I buy locally roasted beans and have a few coffee gadgets at home. I buy K-Cups for use at work. From that perspective - I can be picky. I've tried many K-Cups and these have quickly become my favorite. I've gone through 3 boxes so far and they have been extremely consistent. Well balanced, not bitter, and I haven't gotten tired of the flavor yet. Highly recommended, it's my current favorite, especially at its price range.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Wrigley

product_meta.title: Caribou Coffee Caribou Blend, Single-Serve Keurig K-Cup Pods, Medium Roast Coffee, 72 Count
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Caribou Blend| Size:72 CountThe secret of this blend's relaxed complexity is the rich, hearty Indonesian bean. It has woodsy, spicy notes that balance the bright acidity and lively fruit tones of Central and South American varieties. Caribou Coffee Caribou Blend begins with a satisfying heaviness on your palate. Expect a big-bodied, syrupy taste with a clean, snappy finish of savory bittersweet chocolate. Caribou Blend is an inspired merging of sweet, spicy and berry notes for a smooth, relaxing, down-to-earth cup. A cup of Caribou Blend is perfect for any time of the day! These single-serve K-Cup pods are compatible with all Keurig K-Cup Pod Single-Serve Coffee Makers. Each K-Cup pod is filled with the freshest ground coffee and brews a perfect, great tasting cup of coffee, every time. Enjoy a moment, or several, filled with the highest-quality coffee from Caribou. Rainforest Alliance Certified and Orthodox Union Kosher. Life is short, stay awake for it.
feature_bullets: Balanced sweet spicy and berry notes

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
